text: The discography of American singer-songwriter Eden xo (formerly Jessie Malakouti) consists of four extended plays, twenty singles (including seven as a featured artist), three promotional singles, and fifteen music videos (including two as a featured artist). ==Albums== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"
